posts.content:
Hi, I just bought NwN EE and it's been a long time since I played this game. I'm looking to start playing the originial campaign in HC rules (maybe very difficult, but I don't know how hard it is) and without any henchman, since I prefer playing solo. I want to play a melee character, I like charging in a pack of enemies and doing a lot of damages and tanking. I dont like to play paladin or dwarf, so I'm probably gonna be playing a barbarian, fighter or sword master. But if you have a better suggestion, I'm open to it. If I remember, playing with weapon&shield is a lot better in NwN, but I might be wrong.

Thank you in advance.

posts.content:
Here is a pretty strong build that I played in the OC and then Mines of Twin Summits (MTS), which brings the rest of the way to level 40. If you do decide to also play MTS, you might be better off choosing longsword instead of scimitar.

In hindsight, I would move 5 points from Spellcraft to UMD, and the rest to Lore because MTS is a very high-magic environment. You will get enough saves boosts from gear that the saves boost from Spellcraft would be wasted (+20 total saves boost maximum).
